song_lyrics: Man moh ṭaḷe, Rām maḷe nīrmaḷ harijannā sangthī;
Ur granthī gaḷe, avīdayānā āvraṇ sarve nāse angthī...
Man shuddh hoye ahambhāv maṭe... man 1
Te brahmarūp thaī Parabrahma gāve... man 2
nitya sant sabhā mahī Rām rahe;
Em Veda Pūrāṇ Kurān kahe... man 3
Kahe Brahmānand tenu sharaṇ laī... man 4
title: Man moh ṭaḷe Rām maḷe

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-444: Sadguru Brahmanand Swami

Category: Updeshna Pad
